content: उत्सर्पिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Moving or gliding upwards, rising; पयोधरोत्सर्पिषु ( शीकरेषु) <ls>R. 16. 62.</ls> {@--2@} Soaring, towering; उत्सर्पिणी खलु महतां प्रार्थना <ls>Ś. 7.</ls> {@--3@} Transcendental. --णी {%<ab>f.</ab>%} A division of time (with the Jainas), a long period said to be = ten crores of crores of oceans of year; <ab>cf.</ab> अवसर्पिणी.
